message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient presents with symptoms of mania and a history of major depressive disorder. Valproate is commonly used to treat bipolar disorder, which is characterized by episodes of both mania and depression. The other options are antidepressants, which may worsen the manic symptoms.
